SELECT Q.LECTURE_QUESTION_NUM, Q.LECTURE_QUESTION_TITLE, Q.LECTURE_QUESTION_REG_DATE, W.WEEK_NUM
FROM LECTURE_QUESTION Q JOIN COURSE_WEEKLY W ON Q.WEEK_CODE = W.WEEK_CODE WHERE Q.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} ORDER BY 1 ASC

SELECT Q.LECTURE_QUESTION_NUM, A.LECTURE_ANSWER_REG_DATE FROM LECTURE_QUESTION Q JOIN LECTURE_ANSWER A ON Q.LECTURE_QUESTION_NUM = A.LECTURE_QUESTION_NUM WHERE Q.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} ORDER BY 1 ASC
